fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Bite**: Aggressively bite somebody, attacking them.
**Rage**: Each time you attack somebody upon using this ability, they are also roleblocked.
**Fetch Meat!**: Fetch pork, steak, rabbit, flesh, or chicken from the head, transforming into Wolf(Passive)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Cannot spawn naturally
-Roleblock immune
-If you get visited by 2+ players, you will stay home and rampage.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
